firstProduct.name: 01. LA LAGARTIJA
firstProduct.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavor.

secondProduct.name: 02. EL TIGRE
secondProduct.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel.

thirdProduct.name: 03. LA CUCARACHA
thirdProduct.description: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavors. Caramel,  grapes, strwaberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days.
